description: A watch and cash are among items reported stolen from the late World Cup winner's home on Saturday.
title: Paolo Rossi: Italian World Cup hero's home burgled during funeral
title_page: Paolo Rossi: Italian World Cup hero's home burgled during funeral - BBC News
maintext: "Together we fought, we won and we sometimes lost, always picking ourselves up even in the face of disappointment. We were part of a group, that group, our group. I didn't think he would leave so soon."
